Requirements You are benefiting from cover, are near a feature that allows you to take cover, or are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]

You press yourself against a wall or duck behind an obstacle to take better advantage of cover. If you would have standard cover, you instead gain greater cover, which provides a +4 circumstance bonus to AC; to Reflex saves against area effects; and to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak], or otherwise avoid detection. Otherwise, you gain the benefits of standard cover (a +2 circumstance bonus instead). This lasts until you move from your current space, use an attack action, become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious], or end this effect as a free action.
